statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureManagedIdentity)<-[:HAS]-(vm:AzureVirtualMachine)<-[:RESOURCE]-(at:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE (at)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureManagedIdentity)<-[r:HAS]-(vm:AzureVirtualMachine)<-[:RESOURCE]-(at:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE (at)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:AzureManagedIdentity)<-[:RESOURCE]-(at:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE (at)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureManagedIdentity)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(at:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE (at)-[:RESOURCE]->(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) AND r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
